issue.title: [CI][C#] Build examples in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15264](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15264). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should validate in CI that the C# example always build with the latest version of Arrow.
